channel.title: Mage Book [317][Delta]
channel.description: On my mage book, I want the "Varrock Teleport" buttons and all that to be different names and to teleport to train/pest/assualt/etc Help please?

item.title: Mage Book [317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

You can edit the teleport names in the TextHandler class (TextHandler.java). If you dont seem to have the sendQuest methods which pertain to teleport names, just add these and edit them,

[code=java]
c.sendQuest(“Home Teleport”, 1300);
c.sendQuest(“Teleport back home”, 1301);
c.sendQuest(“Training”, 1325);
c.sendQuest(“Train your combat here”, 1326);
c.sendQuest(“Minigames”, 1350);
c.sendQuest(“Play many minigames here”, 1351);
c.sendQuest(" “, 6399);
c.sendQuest(”@gre@Port Phasmatys", 1382);
c.sendQuest(“Our newest city!”, 1383);
c.sendQuest(“The Quest List”, 640);
c.sendQuest(“Quests”, 663);
c.sendQuest(“Level 94: Vengeance”, 13097);
c.sendQuest(“4 Skulls 10 Earths 2 Deaths”, 13098);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13101);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13102);
c.sendQuest(“Level 90: Teleother Camelot”, 12457);// Teleother Camelot
c.sendQuest(“Teleports target to Camelot”, 12458);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/3", 12461);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/3", 12462);
c.sendQuest(“Level 82: Teleother Falador”, 12437);// Teleother Camelot
c.sendQuest(“Teleports target to Falador”, 12438);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/1", 12442);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/1", 12443);
c.sendQuest("@gre@0/1", 12444);

//Ancients
c.sendQuest(“Home Teleport”, 13037);
c.sendQuest(“Teleport back home”, 13038);
c.sendQuest(“Training”, 13047);
c.sendQuest(“Train your combat here”, 13048);
c.sendQuest(“Minigames”, 13055);
c.sendQuest(“Play many minigames here”, 13056);
c.sendQuest("@gre@Coming Soon!", 13063);
c.sendQuest(“Hint: ectoplasym”, 13064);[/code]

To change the teleport locations, simply find the teleport button id’s and edit the teleport x and y coordinates which in delta servers is the clickingMost class (clickingMost.java). For example, this is a varrock teleport editted,

case 4140: // Varrock Teleport c.triggerTele(2757, 3486, 0); c.sM("You teleport home."); break;

Instead of the triggerTele() method, you may have the toX and toY variables.

Read full topic
